basics.label: Clinical Research Coordinator Mentor - Quality Assurance
basics.summary: Eight years of compliance experience and ability to learn new databases, software, and processes quickly. Proficient in Microsoft office programs and University of Michigan systems such as MiChart, Careweb, eResearch, Qualtrics, Velos, Wolverine Access. Member of UMHS Quality Month Committee.

work.name: Company Name
work.position: Clinical Research Coordinator Mentor - Quality Assurance
work.summary: Audit regulatory, Investigational Drug Service and Informed Consents. Skills include data analysis, maintenance, inventory management. Managed developmental departmental training tools.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Maintained regulatory compliance for 62 oncology clinical trials. Complete initial IRB applications and amend applications in eResearch. Performed QARC audits.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Coordination of Quality Assurance Indicator Project. Skills include database management, proof reading, and website maintenance.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Responsible for website maintenance, calendar management for 5 faculty members and coordination of Health Services Research Fellow Seminars. Prepared surveys.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Coordinated patient care with several departments. General clerical duties. Staff trainer.
